bibl.title: Leiffman v. Stein. Memo to the Defendant
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image.

org.orgName: United States District Court of Washington Territory, Second Judicial District

div1.p: Territory of Washington County of Whitman } ss
To RP. Stein Sheriff of Columbia County W.T.

In the name of the United States: You are hereby commanded that you have the body of Julius Leiffman by you imprisoned and detained as it is said together with the time and cause of such imprisonment and detention, by whatever name the said Julius Leiffman shall be called or charged before the Hon S.C. Wing and Juap of this District Circuit of Washington Territory of the Just Judicial District at his Chambers at Colfax in said District forthwith upon the receipt of this writ to do and receive what shall then and there be considered concerning the said Julius Leiffman and have you then and there this writ
Witness the Hon S.C. Wingard Judge of said District Court and the seal of said Court of Colfax in said District this the 7th day of June A D 1880
